name: 自用字体替换
description: 自用的字体替换。替换google搜索页面的字体，更适合中文。取消蛋疼的宋体。改用微软雅黑和Arial
css:
@-moz-document 
domain("192.168.1.1"),
domain("baidu.com"),
domain("douban.com"),
url-prefix("http://www.infoq.com/cn"), 
url-prefix("http://blog.jobbole.com/"), 
url-prefix("http://feedly.com/"), 
url-prefix("http://www.macx.cn/"), 
url-prefix("http://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki"), 
url-prefix("http://bbs.themex.net/"), 
url-prefix("http://www.zhihu.com/"), 
url-prefix("http://weibo.com/"),
regexp(".*google.com.*")

{
* {
        font-family: 'Hiragino Sans GB W3', 'Hiragino Sans GB', 'Microsoft YaHei UI','Microsoft YaHei',SimSun,'Segoe UI','Lucida Grande',Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif !important;
    }
}
